description: 这款LED手电筒内藏着一个包括消毒纱布、创可贴，棉棒、阿司匹林、布洛芬、镊子、曲别针、刀片、胶布、哨子、医用手套等的急救包，户外运动必备之选
content: Be prepared for any minor injury that may occur in the wild without being weighed down by placing the VSSL first aid container in your backpack. This slim 9″ x 2″ container comes packed with 17 high quality medical-grade first aid essentials.

titleCN: 野蛮人的选择(聚会桌游)
description: 随机抽取一个角色，如Miley Cyrus/Lady Gaga/Kim Jong-Un/Donald Trump/Tony Soprano，然后打出手中最为政治不正确的牌，赢得本局的胜利...
content: Who ever thought that ruining people’s lives could be so much fun? Savage Choices is the party game where players select a character card and attribute cards and go up against a judge in order to try and convince him to live a life as their character.

description: 两种颜色三种高度可选，60W双LED灯缩短丰收周期，通过手机app随时调节生长参数并分享实时图片，在厨房阳台上种植真正属于你的有机蔬菜小农场~
content: Enjoy a steady supply of farm fresh herbs and veggies at your disposal by adding the Farm Plus hydroponic garden to your kitchen’s landscape. Available in 3 grow heights, this sophisticated indoor soil-free garden allows you to grow up to 24 different plants simultaneously!

titleCN: 二次元人造人扫描眼面具
description: 所有对末日主题动漫情有独钟的二次元爱好者们，将下载了对应app的手机放入这款制作精良的人造人扫描眼面具里，然后欣赏朋友被你扫描时的惊骇表情吧
content: Make your post-apocalyptic cyborg costume come to life by topping it off with this animated scanning cyborg adult mask. Simply download the accompanying app, hit play, and slide your smartphone inside of the mask to give off the appearance you have an actual cyborg eye!

description: 将这款充满怀旧气息的录音磁带脚垫放在门口，在一个夏日的午后，追忆在抖音虾米网易云音乐出现之前的上世纪末，年轻的我们是如何为心爱的人录心爱的歌
content: Hey, looks like there’s finally another use for the cassette tape. With the cassette tape doormat you and your guests will be able to wipe your shoes on a novelty rug whose retro design is sure to bring back fond memories of a simpler time.

description: 亚马逊智能插座能让你通过手机APP和Alexa语音轻松对电视、落地灯、风扇、冰箱、咖啡机等电器发布命令，瞬间享受王公贵族颐指气使的优渥生活
content: Make your home smarter than ever with the Amazon smart plug! The smart plug allows you to voice control everyday appliances like lights, TVs, fans, or even your coffee maker – while featuring a slim design that keeps the adjacent outlet free and accessible.

description: 这款旅行打包整理袋套装，能高效地将你携带的衣服、鞋子、化妆品、电子产品等按功能归置，让你看起来干练整洁，好像同时拥有一个巨蟹座妻子和处女座秘书
content: Keep the inside of your suitcase from looking like a total pigsty with these travel organizational packing cubes from Vasco. The set comes with a series of individual cubes that will help keep all of your possessions totally organized.

titleCN: 儿童版可充气霸王龙道具服
description: 拜科幻电影和卡通片所赐，这群庞大的史前爬行动物俘获了好几代人的心，这款自带小型充气泵的霸王龙道具服，让你的小不点儿瞬间化身侏罗纪最大牌的明星
content: This Halloween, make your pint-sized dinosaur enthusiast the center of attention with this hilarious kid’s inflatable T-Rex costume. This officially licensed Jurassic World costume comes with a small fan for easy inflation and is designed to fit children up to 54″ tall.

titleCN: USAopoly《瑞克和莫蒂》版猜谜挑战
titleEN: USAopoly Trivial Pursuit Rick And Morty edition
description: USAopoly经典猜谜挑战系列的《瑞克和莫蒂》版，覆盖了这部神剧每个些微的细节，从家庭关系到历史事件到暗黑科技，验证粉丝成色的时刻到了~
content: Prove you’re the ultimate Rick & Morty fan in the multiverse by putting your knowledge of the hit show to the test with Rick & Morty Trivial Pursuit. It comes with 600 questions with categories like “Technology & Science” and even a “Wubalubadubdub” category!

description: 这款透气性极佳并被各航空公司认可的宠物旅行背包，使你的爱宠通过时尚的透明太空舱设计，欣赏周边景色和你实时互动，让携宠出行更简单更有趣
content: Taking your four-legged family member on-the-go is easier than ever with the capsule pet travel backpack. This stylish and breathable airline approved pack features a transparent design that allows your small pet to enjoy the scenery and interact with the outside world.

Oreo is looking to shake up snack time a bit with the debut of their newest flavors, “hot chicken wings” and “wasabi”. If you’re traveling to China, you’ll be able to indulge and treat your taste buds to these wild and bold new flavors.

description: 使用这款坚固耐用至多可容纳6人的充气弦线穹顶帐篷，让露营变得有趣而轻松，可充气的底座毋需任何安装，4个可关闭通风口让空气自由流通
content: Take the hard work out of setting up your outdoor shelter when you go camping by packing this inflatable geodesic tent. It features an inflatable base that requires no assembly, can accommodate up to 6 people, and features 4 closable ventilation points for great air flow.

description: 将这款轻便小巧耐用防水的追踪器挂在钥匙、钱包、旅行箱等重要物品上，确保在60米半径的范围里，只需轻轻一摁按钮，即可通过88分贝的悠扬乐曲迅速定位
content: Find your keys, EDC gadgets, or just about anything else in record time by attaching the Tile key finder to them. It features a lightweight yet durable and waterproof design with a 200 foot range and an 88 decibel melody that’s 2X as loud as the previous model.

titleCN: 本田超级静音便携式发电机
description: 本田这款2200W/120V的超级静音发电机可持续工作9小时，其间产生的噪音在低于60分贝，基本上和咖啡厅里情侣之间的聊天类似，是露营时夜间充电最佳之选
content: Keep your electric devices going without having to endure hours of loud background noise by upgrading to these super quiet portable generators from Honda. This 2200-Watt 120-Volt generator operates at 48 to 57 dBA – which is a lower volume than a regular conversation.

description: 这款散发淡香的神奇产品，通过加速血液循环和促进肌肉活动而分泌更多的汗液并消耗额外的热量，在健身前将其涂抹在小腹臀部大腿等部位，让每天的健身在甜汗里事半功倍
content: Make those pounds shed faster than ever before by complementing your killer workouts with the Sweet Sweat workout enhancer. It is designed to improve circulation and increase sweating while encouraging thermogenic and muscle activity during your work out.

description: 这款Keurig K迷你咖啡机名声在外毋需多言，5英尺的修长外型能适应最狭小的空间，经典的红黑设计能与任何风格的家居完美契合，让你随时随地品尝到顶级的浓香黑咖啡
content: The Keurig K-Mini makes it possible to enjoy a top quality roast virtually anywhere you go. It can brew up to 12 ounces, features a spacious storage area large enough to hold up to 9 pods, and a slim 5″ wide design that make it ideal for virtually any counter top.

Gain a deeper appreciation for one of television’s most beloved and influential personalities by sitting down with The Good Neighbor. This extremely well-written full-length biography will walk you through every aspect of the extraordinary Fred Roger’s long and inspiring life.

Uncover the hidden world inside everyday objects by flipping through the pages of Cut In Half. This unique read gives you a front row seat at the complex innards of everyday objects and appliances raging from a golf ball and a boxing glove, to a laptop and vacuum cleaner.

description: 这款价格不菲的打火机完全仿照《幽灵党》电影中邦德使用的同款设计，和你的贝瑞塔手枪及阿斯顿马丁跑车非常般配，中间的弹孔和隐藏的隔断让你可以像王牌特工一样将机密藏匿其中
content: Spark up in true secret agent fashion by lighting your cigarettes with this 007 James Bond Spectre lighter. It’s designed exactly like the one featured in the film and comes with a bullet hole at the center plus a secret compartment ideal for storing small items.

description: 毋需钻孔不用布线，这款可覆盖160°视角的智能摄像头能被轻易安装在门廊上，并可通过手机打开实时视频和来访者进行通话，自带的动作传感器支持红外夜视功能24小时监测
content: The Remo wire-free over-the-door smart camera can easily be mounted on any residential door within seconds without having to drill any holes or mess with your electrical wiring. It’s Wi-Fi enabled and captures a 160° peripheral field of view of its surroundings.

description: 使用这款仅有8盎司重不足5英尺高的便携式金属安全门档可以承受强力冲击，非常适合旅行留学出差的单身女性在宾馆宿舍及出租房间使用，额外的安全保护使你高枕无忧
content: Instantly add an extra layer of security to any door in your home with the portable door jammer. Although small in size, the door jammer is surprisingly strong – and it can successfully jam any door with at least a 1/8″ gap of space beneath it.

description: 将你的爱犬打扮成夹着生菜涂着黄芥末的美味热狗，用TensorFlow仿照HBO热剧《硅谷》做一款 “Not Hotdog” APP，然后看一看人工智能是否真的足够聪明
content: Get your small furry friend in on all the Halloween fun this year by slipping him into this adorable hot dog pet costume. This hilarious little getup will turn your festive pup into a plump and juicy hot dog topped with lettuce and mustard.

description: 不论是晴朗夏日里舒适的林间小憩还是浓浓秋色中浪漫的野外露营，这款内置防蚊帐及自充气床垫并能在合适的时机变身为吊床的的帐篷，可为你提供最好的野外睡眠体验
content: Ensure you have a comfy place to sleep no matter what type of environment you encounter in the wild by packing the Crua hybrid hammock/tent/air mattress. It includes a built-in self-inflating air mattress in addition to attached bug mesh to keep out annoying insects.

titleCN: 充气式马达驱动双浮筒平底舟
description: 钓鱼是科技含量极高的一项休闲运动，这款由马达驱动的平底舟以粉末涂料喷漆的钢管为主体，并携带2个底部抗刮损度强且负重能力极佳的浮筒，让你深水浅水畅行无阻
content: Increase your chances of catching fish next time you hit the water by hopping aboard this inflatable pontoon with a motor mount. The powder coated steel tube frame and 2 heavy duty pontoons with abrasion-resistant PVC bottoms make it perfect for shallow waters.

description: 这些由天然矿石打磨的LED夜灯，能在夜里透过表面的纹理发散出橘色或银色的柔和光线，像极了空中悬着的一轮圆月，是装饰浪漫家居和打造梦幻露营必不可少的道具
content: Give your humble abode a warm and inviting ambiance after the sun goes down with these natural ore led night lights. These battery operated lights emit a soft relaxing glow and feature a super lightweight design that make them ideal for camping trips.

titleCN: 互动式手指霸王龙玩偶
description: 这款设计可爱多种颜色可选的霸王龙玩偶会像考拉熊一样攀附在你的手指上，然后基于周围的环境、触摸动作、以及声音，发出一阵阵属于侏罗纪的嚎叫
content: Make your workdays a little more palatable by entertaining yourself with this cute little interactive T-Rex action figure. This little fella grips onto your finger and belts out wild dino roars as it reacts to motion, sound, and touch.

description: 她可以帮你接通Skype视频通话，她可以为你播放最喜欢的电影，她可以清晰听到你的指令，即便正在用杜比音箱为你单曲循环你最爱的那首歌，她让你的生活变得简单而多彩
content: Make your day-to-day life run smoother than ever with this second generation Amazon Echo Show. This indispensable Alexa-enabled device will assist you in everything from choosing the perfect song to making calls, automating your home, and much much more!

description: 8种预设光线模式、1600万种可选颜色、50000小时LED芯片时长，只需在手机APP上轻轻一划，就可营造出或浪漫或动感的迷人灯效，更可以让光线随着音乐的节奏自我变换翩翩起舞
content: Change the entire look and feel of your patio at the touch of a button by outfitting your home with the iLUX smart led flood lights. They can be controlled independently from each other, come with 8 preset modes, and offer countless color options.

description: 懂得合作才能共赢，这款6米长的团队合作跑步垫可容纳至多7个人，必须所有人通力合作才能稳步前进，是团队建设或文娱活动时必不可少的游戏道具~
content: Make learning fun for your young students by teaching them about cooperation using these teamwork run mats. Large enough to fit up to 7 kids, everyone inside must must walk along the mat while the lead person pulls down on the mat to keep it moving forward.

titleCN: 青柠味道吸入式咖啡因
description: 羡慕卡卡罗特的仙豆和大力水手的菠菜罐头？这款不含卡路里青柠味道的粉末包含100毫克的咖啡因和维他命B，只需打开瓶盖吸入口中，就能让你瞬间满血复活，恢复100%的战斗力
content: Get an instant energy boost anytime, anywhere, by consuming an inhalable caffeine shot. You simply remove the cap, place it on your lips, and gently inhale to receive a unique blend of 100 mg of caffeine and B Vitamins that’ll keep you sharp and ready for anything.

description: 这款听起来很像《哈利波特》书中魔法道具的手套，使用柔软且吸水性极强的材料编织，可以吸收其自身重量28倍的鼻涕眼泪汗水等体液，是送给晨跑或滑雪爱好者最实用的爱心礼物
content: Keep a days-worth of germs and other body fluids at hand by putting on these comfy snot mittens. The gloves are made with a soft and ultra-absorbent material that is designed to absorb 28x its weight in snot, tears, and sweat.

description: 作为一名音乐爱好者，当灵感不期而至时手边却没有乐器是最令人惋惜的事情；这款工具箱能让你在顷刻间做出一款自带功放音箱的迷你电吉他，使你突然来袭的灵感在琴弦中尽情释放
content: Turn wherever you are into the perfect location for an impromptu jam session with the ultra portable Gakken mini electric guitar kit. This pint-sized electric guitar comes with built-in amplifier and speaker making it the perfect instrument for the musician on-the-go.

description: 这款直径20英尺的超大号哭宝宝面具，能将你瞬间变成搞笑的巨婴国王子，除了万圣节可以用来装可爱之外，也是吵架后哄他/她开心时屡试不爽的绝妙道具
content: Make people scream with laughter rather ran fear this Halloween by trading in your monster mask for this hilarious gigantic crying baby mask. This twenty inch diameter mask will transform you into a ginormous mutant baby with the body of a full-grown adult.

description: 这款载重350磅的电动车可在其伪装成冷藏箱的座位里放置24听罐装啤酒，让你驾驶时痛快畅饮而不必顾忌酒驾罚单，铭记大法官Kavanaugh的名言: I like beer.
content: Don’t let a silly DUI license suspension stop you from enjoying your god-given-right to recklessly cruise around while drinking – with the motorized cooler scooter you can stay mobile while keeping your freedom fighting beers as cold as the rockies. ‘Murica salutes you!

description: 这一系列设计独特的3D装饰窗帘，能瞬间将你的房间变成如纳尼亚传奇般充满魔法的世界，只要将那扇窗变成西部片的酒吧、地中海的阳台、太阳系的图谱、9¾的站台...
content: Instantly liven up any part of your home by hanging up these fantastic 3D cube curtains in your bedroom or living room. The 3D design will add incredible depth to your plain walls while the vivid color scheme will surely brighten up the room.

description: 电气时代太多开关让人时而手足无措，这款能在夜里发光的开关贴纸，不但用世界通用的符号清晰标记了每个开关的用途，其新颖的3D设计也为你的家居增添了些许时尚气息
content: Make your home more user-friendly by installing these light switch cover labels. These handy glow in the dark domed emblems feature an adhesive backing for easy application in addition to universal iconography so that you can know which switch is which.

description: 历史中的圣人为我们盗出了希望之火，点燃了生命之灯，照亮了未来之路，让我们在烛光的微香里缅怀他/她们吧：林肯、爱因斯坦、卡尔萨根、爱伦坡、弗里达、莎士比亚...
content: Give praise to the true god(s) of the universe with these pop culture worship candles. Lighting the candles activates the magically blasphemous powers endowed to entertainers of great caliber like Walter White, Ron Swanson, and Bill Fuckin’ Murray.

titleCN: 终极便携式电源储藏盒
description: 作为出行频繁的商务人士，这款带100wh交流电插头，2.4A USB接口，OLED显示频，支持无线充电且被航空公司许可的25,600毫安便携式电源储藏盒，是绝对的必备之选
content: When you’re on-the-move there’s no better option than the Sherpa 100 AC power bank from Goal Zero. This 25,600 mAh airline approved power station features a 100wh AC power outlet, wireless charging, an OLED display, and 2.4A USB ports.

If love’s got you down, lift your spirits up with I Hope You Find Me: The Love Poems of Craigslist’s Missed Connections. Author Alan Feur has amassed hundreds of sweet, raunchy, and odd odes from Craigslist into some hilarious and sometimes heartbreaking poems.

description: 这款25.6英尺高的4合1游戏桌可以在桌上足球、空气冰球、趣味乒乓球、迷你台球之间自由切换，让你和朋友们在无聊时可以重温前手机时代里那些简单而真实的快乐
content: This 4-in-1 game table will help you stave off boredom without having to resort to using any of your electronic gadgets. It stands at 25.6″ tall and can easily be converted to either a fun foosball, ping pong, air hockey, or pool table for some good old fashioned fun.

description: 有什么比火焰从栩栩如生的陶瓷南瓜灯眼睛和嘴里喷射而出更让人毛骨悚然？这款清洁环保并可耐1500摄氏度高温的壁炉装饰是万圣节时增添恐怖气氛绝佳道具~
content: Give your Halloween party some hellish ambient lighting by throwing these fire pit Jack-O-Lantern pumpkins into the flames. Each pumpkin can withstand temperatures of 3000°F and features a hollowed out center so the flames show through the eyes, nose, and mouth.

description: 这款亚马逊第三代Echo Dot秉承了一贯的简约优雅设计风格，音效更具层次感，Alexa更加智能，辅以更强的语音识别，完美融入你倾力打造的智能家居
content: The third generation of the Amazon Echo Dot is here with a slimmed down minimalist design that will look good in any part of your home or office. Apart from the sleek design, it boasts a more potent internal speaker and can connect to other smart devices in your home.

description: 这款颜色鲜艳的独角兽颈枕连帽衫，颈枕如丝绸般柔滑，内置小珠子能舒适按摩颈部，连帽衫更能在熟睡时有效保护隐私，绝对是长途旅行时每个孩子的必备之物
content: Help make long trips easier on the kids by keeping them comfortable with this cheery unicorn neck pillow hoodie. It’s made from silky soft fabric, is filled with tiny microbeads for ultimate comfort, and comes with a cute unicorn hoodie that provides privacy while sleeping.

titleCN: 高尔夫球杆蓝牙扬声器 & 充电宝
titleEN: Golf Club Bluetooth Speaker & Power Bank
description: 你可以将这款高尔夫球杆蓝牙扬声器和其他球杆一起放在你的球包里，然后就可以在高尔夫球场挥杆的同时，一边给其他电子设备充电，一边惬意地欣赏音乐
content: Make your next relaxing golf day the best one yet by giving it a groovy soundtrack using this golf club Bluetooth speaker and power bank. It allows you to conveniently listen to tunes, make calls, and even keep your devices juiced up.

description: 这款蜘蛛侠蛛网喷射器可以给你的小超级英雄带来巨大的惊喜：只需简单将其安置在蜘蛛侠同款的红色手套上，就可以欣赏你的小小英雄和他的偶像那样拯救世界了..
content: Make your pint-sized superhero feel just like the iconic web-slinger by surprising him with this Spider-Man silly string web shooter. Simply attach the plastic mount to the Spidey styled red glove and watch him shoot out silly string like his favorite hero.

titleEN: The Height Adjustable TV Pole Mount
description: 还在发愁如何在新家的墙壁上钻洞来固定电视？这款能调节高度的电视放置杆可支持32英尺至65英尺的所有电视，让你在任何地点和角度随心所欲观看你最喜欢的节目
content: Why limit yourself to drilling holes in the wall when now you can mount your TV anywhere in your home with the height adjustable TV pole mount? It can support any TV ranging from 32 to 65 inches and can easily swivel for the best viewing experience.

description: 买了房子之后难免需要时不时修理各样问题，这时合用的工具触手可及就至关重要，StickQuik这款内置强力钕铁硼磁铁的产品，可轻易将任何表面转变成迷你工具箱
content: Ensure your most frequently used tools are always at hand by placing them on this magnetic tool holder set from StickQuik. These small but powerful Neodymium magnets come in a range of sizes so that you can accommodate a variety of different tools.

titleCN: 符合解剖学构造的心形花瓶
description: 这款10英尺高完全符合解剖学构造的心形树脂手工涂漆花瓶，配上玫瑰花之后呈现出略带哥特气息的后现代艺术风格，是情人节或纪念日赠予心上人品味最独特的礼物
content: This Valentine’s day, show your undying love and devotion for your beloved in a truly eye-catching way by placing her flowers in this anatomically correct heart vase. It’s cast in resin, hand painted, and stands at ten and a half inches.

titleCN: Sphero球形闪电可编程机器人
description: Sphero这款自带可编程(支持Scratch和Javascrip)红外线、LED屏、罗盘、光感器、陀螺仪的球形闪电机器人，绝对让你的小不点儿轻易爱上编程，顺便强烈安利刘慈欣同名小说
content: Sphero BOLT is the interactive programmable robot guaranteed to get your little programmer excited about learning to code. They’ll be able to create and customize games while learning to code by drawing on the screen, using Scratch block or writing Javascript.

description: 如果你爱杰克.伦敦的小说，如果你是《荒野生存》的影迷，那么这款配有3.5英尺外科钢刀片粗粝耐用的战术级破窗匕首，绝对是你打猎露营或野外探险时不可或缺的贴身之物
content: Channel your inner Rambo when you venture into the wild equipped with the tactical glass breaker knife. This rugged survival knife comes in a sturdy spring assisted sheath and features a razor sharp 3.5″ surgical steel blade ideal for hunting and camping.

description: 滑雪攀岩冲浪赛车？这款配有可潜33英尺深防水外壳的黑色GoPro Hero 7，能在语音控制下拍摄4K高清视频及1200万像素照片，把你每一次肾上腺素狂飙的精彩瞬间都永久保存
content: Getting incredible action shots of your adrenaline-fueled lifestyle is easier than ever with the GoPro Hero 7 Black. It features a rugged waterproof case that can dive down to 33 feet, shoots 4K HD video, captures 12MP photos, and can be controlled using voice commands.

description: 这款革命性的便携式BBQ披萨烤箱能将你的燃气烧烤架轻易变成功能齐全的美味披萨烤箱，让你和朋友们在户外也能品尝到味道正宗的披萨饼
content: Revolutionize outdoor cookouts by transforming your gas grill into a fully functional pizza oven! With this BBQ pizza oven box from BakerStone you’ll be able to convert your gas grill into a gourmet oven capable of reaching temperatures of up to 800 degrees Fahrenheit.

description: 如果你恰好同时喜欢僵尸题材电影及室内保龄球运动，那这款断头僵尸保龄球绝对合你胃口，可以想象当你从包里将其拿出来时，球馆里的人们会对你投来何等敬畏的目光
content: Heads will roll when you arrive at the bowling alley sporting these disturbing decapitated head bowling balls. These highly detailed bowling balls are the perfect gift idea for the avid bowler with a dark and demented sense of humor.

description: 心情低落的阴雨天，一杯咖啡一把坚果一个牛角面包，蜷缩在这款从24英尺到79英尺各种尺寸都有的纯手工编织厚毛线毯里，听着喜欢的唱片，读一本期待已久的书
content: Make dreary, rainy, or cold days something to look forward to by snuggling up in one of these handmade chunky knit blankets. They’re available in sizes ranging from 24″ x 24″ to 47″ x 71″ so that you can find just the right one for you.

titleCN: 乐高星战X翼星际战机套装
description: 这款731片装的乐高玩具能让你搭建带有杠杆驱动机翼及可收缩起落架的经典X翼星际战机，赶快和迷你的乐高天行者卢克及R2D2一起，向义军同盟宣誓你的忠诚吧~
content: Show your loyalty for the Rebel Alliance by adding your very own LEGO X-Wing Starfighter to your collection. This 731-piece set allows you to build a classic X-Wing complete with lever-activated wings, a retractable landing gear, and a LEGO Luke Skywalker and R2-D2!

description: 这款模块化的室内/室外家具提供4模块和6模块两种选择，每个模块彼此独立并可按你的审美单独重新摆设，完全聚苯乙烯制造，单个模块仅重22磅且100%环保可回收
content: Change your patio’s entire look and feel on a whim by making this modular indoor/outdoor furniture part of your decor. Available in either 4 or 6 piece modules, each piece in the set can be rearranged to your liking – making it perfect for any social gathering.

description: 这款6英尺半不粘黏的硅胶模具可承受-20°C至230°C的温差，可爱的沙皮狗造型适合和孩子们一起制作蛋糕、面包、果冻、布丁、糖果、巧克力、冷饮、软糖、蜡笔、肥皂时使用
content: Impress the family with your amazing baking skills by whipping up adorable little Shar-Pei desserts using this versatile cake mold. This non-stick silicone mold can withstand temperatures ranging from -20°C to 230°C making it ideal for preparing both hot and frozen treats.

titleCN: Ring竖起式以太网供电监视器
description: 不论你置身何处，这款提供1080p画质的竖起式以太网供电监视器，可以让你通过手机和平板电脑观看实时图像、听到高保真声音、并进行语音互动对话，给你的家提供最好的保护
content: Monitor your property in stunning 1080p by setting up the Ring Stick Up PoE camera. The first ever power over ethernet capable camera from Ring, this discreet indoor/outdoor camera allows you to see, hear, and speak to people from your smartphone in real time!

description: 这款射程达30英尺并能将卫生纸和纯净水变成取之不尽用之不竭可降解环保弹药的冲击波步枪，能让你将一团团被水浸泡过的卫生纸射向你的宿敌，是每一个喜欢无伤大雅恶作剧孩子的必选之物
content: Transform your home’s t.p. rolls into ammo that will annoy your friends to no extent by arming yourself with this toilet paper blaster rifle. You’ll be able to fire over 350 perfect little water-soaked spitballs up to thirty feet away with a simple pull of the trigger.

Get on the fast track to a healthier diet without feeling like you’re giving up all your favorite foods by putting your trust in The Dude Diet. This book comes packed with 125 incredibly delicious yet deceptively healthy recipes that will make your mouth water.

description: 这款多彩色可调节亮度的模块化灯墙，能让充满艺术天赋的你随心所欲在智能手机上即兴创作一套色彩主题，然后轻松将其应用到客厅和卧室，弹指一念间改变整个房间的氛围的外观
content: Change the feel and appearance of any room on a whim using these modular light surface tiles. The simple square design allows you to set them up into countless different shapes – allowing you to create truly memorizing patterns.

description: 驾驶途中太寂寞？亚马逊车载Echo让Alexa成为你的忠实的副驾驶：指路导航、找加油站和停车位、播放你最喜欢的音乐或有声读物、为你打开车库门、甚至在途中就帮你预热了烤箱
content: Make the most out of each drive by making Alexa your co-pilot using the Amazon Echo Auto. This handy device allows you to easily perform a myriad of activities from choosing your favorite tunes to voice-controlling your home from your car.

Increase the chances of finding u’re intellectually pretentious counterpart, bye wearing this high brow grammer lover shirt. Its’s the perfect gift four the grammer nazi’s who become enraged at the site of emproper spelling, and grammetical errors.

titleCN: 古怪舞臂气球人道具服
description: 你也许在很多商店门口都遇见过疯狂舞动手臂的气球人装饰，这款提供多种靓丽可选色彩的古怪充气道具服，让你轻松复刻一个6英尺高的霹雳舞怪咖吉祥物
content: Fill All Hallows’ Eve with whimsy and fun instead of terror by dressing up in this wacky waving inflatable tube man costume. The costume measures six feet tall and is available in vibrant color options like red, yellow, orange, purple, and green.

titleCN: 重口味辣鳄梨酱品客薯片
description: 这款不含任何胆固醇和反式脂肪的品客薯片，为你带来浓浓的墨西哥风情，酸甜微辣的调料夹杂着浓郁的鳄梨酱清香，瞬间攻陷你多愁善感的味蕾，让你毫无仁慈地消灭一整桶绿色薯片
content: Send your taste buds into ecstasy by snacking on these spicy guacamole Pringles. Once you pop open the can, the sweet and zesty aroma of these delectable green chips will engulf your senses until you finish the very last one.

titleEN: Come In Go Away Door Mat
description: 这款设计独特的双意门垫，根据进门时和离开时的目光角度，分别读作“请进”和“再见”，像极了霍格沃茨城堡里那些被施了咒语的地毯，恰到好处地展示了主人的幽默感与生活情趣
content: Welcome guests to your home or dismiss them with ease depending on your mood with this clever “Come in, Go away” ambigram door mat. This two-in-one door mat reads “Come in” when looked at from one direction, and “Go away” when flipped upside down.

description: 这款猫脸纸巾盒把每次拿纸巾的动作都变成了和爱丽丝梦游仙境里那只身体消失的柴郡猫夺取食物的战斗，在伤风感冒或难过流泪这些需要纸巾的至暗时刻，为你带来些许幽默与丝丝慰藉
content: Give the cat person in your life something to smile about when they’re under the weather by surprising them with this cat head tissue box. Each time they go reach for a tissue, they’ll have to pull it from the mouth a cute little feline.

description: 拥挤的帐篷会造成糟糕的露营体验，这款可容纳至多12人的超大帐篷2分钟即可搭建好，而且分散式的布局又在最大程度上保护了隐私，是露营时建立庞大“金帐汗国”时不可或缺的工具
content: With the 12-person 3-room camping tent you’ll be able to enjoy quality outdoor time with the family without feeling like you’re constantly on top of each other. It sets up in just under 2 minutes and features a well distributed layout that allows for maximum privacy.

description: 当20世纪最火的桌游遇到21世纪最火的网游会是什么样的体验？没错，这款大富翁之堡垒之夜就在回答这个问题，选择你熟悉的游戏角色开始游戏吧，记住，最后只能有一个胜利者
content: Make family game night more appealing and fun for your Gen-Z offspring with Monopoly: Fortnite edition. With over 27 different character pieces to choose from, each player will get to build walls, pick up health packs, and damage opponents until only one victor remains.

description: 这款由光亮涂料加工过的聚乙烯制成的半透明气球灯，看起来像是注满了荧光液体的氢气球悬浮在屋顶一样，营造出宫崎骏动画般奇特而诡异的画面感，是装饰小幻想家卧室最好的选择
content: Light up your kid’s room with these suspended balloon lamps that look like a helium balloon got filled with glow stick fluid and was let go in the house. These balloon lamps are made from translucent satinized polyethylene and cleverly use the balloon string as the light switch.

titleCN: 乐高创造者之泰姬陵套装
description: 让人扼腕的爱情故事，令人赞叹的宏伟宫殿，乐高这款6000片创造者泰姬陵套装，让你用全新的视角来近距离欣赏莫卧儿王朝这座融合了印度和波斯两大文化的穆斯林建筑瑰宝
content: Recreate one of the world’s most iconic architectural wonders by taking on this LEGO creator Taj Mahal set. You’ll be able to marvel at the structural beauty of this iconic landmark up close as you painstakingly put together its almost 6,000 pieces!

titleCN: 乐高百兽王战神金刚套装
description: 在浩瀚宇宙漫长的岁月里，人们流传着一个关于超级机器人的传说，乐高这款2321片百兽王战神金刚套装让你重温儿时的经典，冲吧，勇敢的狮子战队，我来组成头部！
content: Keep your home – and the universe – free from evil by building your very own Voltron using this awesome LEGO set. With this 2,321 piece set you’ll be able to construct the five mighty lions that join forces to form an imposing 15 inch tall LEGO Votron.

description: 好的产品永远都在试图解决尚未出现的需求，比如亚马逊这款Alexa声控微波炉，除了帮你解冻蔬菜加热剩饭之外，还能实时监控爆米花储量并通过亚马逊Dash按钮帮你自动续订
content: Introducing the device you never asked for – the Amazon Alexa voice controlled microwave! It boasts features nobody would ever need in their lives such as the indispensable auto-popcorn replenishment system that reorders the good stuff when supplies is running low.

Feel sexier than ever by rocking your very own dadbod in this hairy chest outfit. This outrageously disturbing outfit will make you the center of attention wherever you go and makes a great conversation piece for any social gathering or event.

description: 每一个成熟男人家里都应该常备一把火力劲爆射速高达每秒发射8枚海绵子弹的NERF普罗米修斯MXVII-20K冲锋枪，然后在有尊贵客人造访的时出其不意地冲进客厅对其扫射一番
content: Gain an instant advantage over your opponents by walking into battle strapped with the NERF Rival Prometheus MXVII-20K blaster. It boasts an Advanced Acceleration System that lets you shoot up to 8 rounds per second!

description: 想飞上天和太阳肩并肩？这款小巧的背包式动力伞碳纤维飞行器在安全性能和可操控性方面都有了飞跃提高，要记住，斯塔克的钢铁侠战衣也是从莱特兄弟试图让一把椅子飞上天开始的
content: Glide through the skies like a majestic eagle with the backpack paramotor aircraft. This carbon fiber and aluminum paramotor features a reliable compact design that really comes in handy when you want to give your old water jet pack a rest.

description: 不管是加州的大火还是北京的雾霾，Airmega这款实时监控空气质量并可预设警报的智能空气净化器，可以定时开启和关闭，能轻松地在1256平方英尺的区域内为你创造清新的穹顶之下
content: Instantly improve your home’s air quality by bringing in the Airmega 3000 smart air purifier. It features a real-time air monitoring system that provides air quality alerts, comes with a timer option, and can cover an area of up to 1,256 Sq. Ft.

titleCN: 充气式堡垒之夜战斗大巴
description: 当你将这款官方授权的18英尺长18英尺高聚酯纤维充气式堡垒之夜战斗大巴悬浮在前院的那一刻，你就自动荣膺了全街区最酷住户的头衔，准备接受女邻居的爱慕眼神和男邻居的羡慕嫉妒恨吧
content: Be the envy of all your neighbors by having the coolest outdoor setup by placing this inflatable Fortnite battle bus in your frontyard. It comes with a built-in pump for maximum convenience and measures eighteen feet long by almost eighteen feet high.

description: 作为一个有品位的80后骨灰级游戏玩家，索尼这款比原装小了45%的PlayStation经典复刻游戏机带来的不仅是复古情怀，还有久违的《铁拳3》和《最终幻想7》，让你瞬间沦陷在往日的美好时光里
content: Game like it’s the late ’90s all over again with the Sony PlayStation classic console! While it’s modeled after the original PlayStation, this updated model is actually 45% smaller and comes with classic 20 built-in games like Tekken 3 and Final Fantasy VII.

description: 为了赢取下一场在后院进行NERF大战，军备竞赛不可避免，当对手们还执迷于改装常规NERF枪时，这款射程达6米的60mm口径海绵手雷战术迫击炮能从火力和心理上双重击溃任何负隅顽抗之敌
content: Kick your backyard warfare up a notch by adding this foam grenade soft bullet launcher to your arsenal. This lightweight and portable weapon will allow you to launch small NERF-like bombs up to a distance of twenty feet away.

description: 从雷神到囧雪诺，好莱坞一线男明星们似乎在一夜间都开始留起了发髻，别担心，这款夹戴式男性发髻让追求时尚的你毋需蓄长头发就可以轻松改变风格和形象，一夜之间跟上潮流
content: Turn yourself into a modern day Fabio without having to grow out your hair by snapping on one of these clip on man buns. Its available in several different colors so that you can ooze with sex appeal to all kinds of women with horrible taste in men.

description: 曾经沉迷于《恐龙特级克塞号》或《最后一只恐龙丹佛》的你如今也为人父母了，这款在水中浸泡后能剥离的仿真化石恐龙蛋让你的小不点儿像古生物学家一样探究远古爬行动物的奥秘
content: Make your little dino lover feel like a real life paleontologist with these Dig It Up dinosaur eggs! Simply soak each 3-inch clay egg in water and then carefully chisel away the shell to unearth the cool little surprise inside.

description: 每次试图将切好的食物倒入器皿时总会撒落一地狼狈不堪？这款设计独特的弹性原木切菜案板，既保证了表面坚实平坦，又保证了弹性足够可被弯曲，让喜欢烹饪的你从此备菜无比轻松
content: This flexible natural wood cutting board makes meal-prepping simpler than ever! The ingenious design provides both a sturdy cutting surface while allowing you to easily pour your chopped up ingredients into the bowl or pot with no mess at all.

description: 如果汽车都可被无人驾驶，为何咖啡还需要亲手搅拌？轻轻按下手柄上的按钮，这款独一无二的马克杯就会为你自动呈上一杯搅拌均匀的咖啡，没错，科技的进步源自一次次无厘头的创新
content: Make your hectic mornings run a little smoother by preparing your coffee with this self stirring mug. At the push of a button, this unique mug automatically begins to mix the contents within – perfect for lazy tea and coffee drinkers everywhere.

titleEN: The Art Of Rick & Morty Book
description: 终于有一本书来深度解读这部有史以来最烧脑的动画片了！这本《瑞克和莫蒂的艺术》从编剧和动画设计的视角为粉丝们复盘了每一个爆笑情节和无敌脑洞的来龙去脉，绝对让你大呼过瘾
content: Expand your knowledge and appreciation of the infinite Rick & Morty multiverse by reading The Art Of Rick & Morty book. You’ll gain access to intimate commentary from the show’s creators in addition to all sorts of insider information guaranteed to intrigue and amaze.

description: 金庸武侠里刀谱剑诀无数，但现实世界中这本《瑞士军刀使用秘籍》是你唯一的机会。这本书用63个详实的案例，为你剥茧抽丝讲述了如何在荒野中只用这款经典武器坚韧地生存下去
content: Learn how to survive in the wild with nothing more than your trusty pocket knife by reading The Swiss Army Knife book. This informative read comes filled with everything you’ll need to make the most out of your handy and versatile knife.

description: 作为一款曾经创下众筹纪录的产品，这款自带颈枕、眼罩、手套、饮水袋、拉链笔等功能，舒适又时尚的旅行夹克绝对名至实归，让你像忍者一样不断掏出花样道具应对所有危机
content: Head out wearing the Baubax multi-function travel jacket and you’ll be ready for anything your trip throws your way. Both fashionable and comfortable, this fully functional hoodie features everything from a built-in neck pillow to a passport pocket and earphone holders.

titleCN: 碳冻汉·索洛充气道具服
description: 在云之城汉·索洛对莉亚公主深情告白后被碳冻的情节是星战系列中最为震撼的一幕，这款100%尼龙的碳冻汉·索洛充气道具服，让你轻松复刻帝国反击战中这一经典时刻
content: Show up to your next Halloween party in this Han Solo trapped in carbonite inflatable costume and you’ll be a shoe-in for best getup! It’s made from 100% nylon and features a hook and loop close for easy access in and out.

description: 对糖分和脂肪的追求是漫长进化过程中镌刻在我们的DNA里的深深烙印，这款裹有天然焦糖和枫糖的山胡桃木烟熏猪肉脯甜中带咸口感独特嚼劲十足，是饕客们不能错过的美味
content: Give any plate an added dose of sweetness by topping it off with some brown sugar jerky candied bacon. These juicy slabs of prime hickory bacon are blended with brown sugar and maple syrup to create a delectable treat that’s both salty and sweet.

description: 这款14英尺高可调亮度的螺旋状LED桌灯将照明器材的艺术性和实用性提升到了全新高度，无论放置在任何角落，这款散发银色亮光充满后现代设计的桌灯都能瞬间让你眼前一亮
content: Instantly add a stylish spin to any room in your home by lighting up the place with this spiral led table lamp. This unique lamp features a contemporary and artsy spiral design that provides quaint ambient lighting in all directions.

description: 哈利波特、指环王、纳尼亚传奇、权利的游戏，魔法的世界总是让人如痴如醉，这款混乱魔法巫师牌让你和朋友们沉浸在一个奇特又搞笑的魔法世界里，用咒语和欢笑互相攻击
content: Give your weekly game nights a fun twist with Magicka Mayhem – the card game of magic, spells, and pure mayhem! You can rain fiery ouchies on your wizard enemies, protect yourself using elemental shields, and even summon elementals to do your bidding.

titleCN: NERF N-Strike精英全自动冲击枪
description: 在激烈的NERF战斗中，高射速武器提供的火力压制是胜利的关键，这款N-Strike精英全自动冲击枪让你只需考虑如何将弹药倾泻在敌人身上而毋需顾虑换匣带来的哑火空隙
content: Unleash a barrage of mayhem on your enemy by walking into the battlefield armed with this NERF N-Strike Elite Infinus! This fully-motorized blaster comes with an ample drum that automatically loads darts into the gun for rapid fire action!

description: 穿着洁白的婚纱在教堂的钟声里和挚爱的人许下至死不渝的誓言是每个女孩儿一生中最值得铭记的时刻，这款新娘婚纱伴侣让妳在这个特别的日子里毋需担心如厕时的任何不便
content: Wearing luxurious gowns is all good and fun until it’s time for a dreaded bathroom break. Luckily the Bridal Buddy is here to save the day! This ingenious accessory makes it possible to easily lift up your entire gown to make your next potty experience easier than ever.

description: 如果你有一个在夏日开刨冰店然后邂逅男神的梦想，那么这款配有专业级电机和301加固不锈钢刀片，每3秒就能生产一份清爽可口刨冰的高级优质刨冰机是你梦想成真的第一步
content: There’s no better way to beat the heat than by treating yourself to a refreshing homemade snowcone! And now with this premium shaved ice machine you’ll be able to make all the frosty and fluffy snow cones you want in as little as 3 seconds!

description: 不管你是乐高粉还是星战粉，这款7541片装的经典乐高千年隼套装都是无可争议的瑰宝级珍藏，很多乐高套装也许只是昙花一现的风潮，但这一套绝对历久弥新值得投资收藏
content: Get to know every nook and cranny of the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy better than Han and Chewy by building this incredible LEGO Millennium Falcon set. This 7,541 piece set features an insane level of detailing – making the finished model a great collector’s item.

titleCN: 便携式单晶硅太阳能面板
description: 不管去新墨西哥州的沙漠里探险还是在蒙古高原浩瀚的戈壁滩自驾，这款全天候便携式50瓦功率的单晶硅太阳能面板，让你在人迹罕至的地方也能轻松从太阳汲取无尽的能量
content: Harnessing the power of the sun is easier than ever with these Goal Zero solar panels. Crafted from strong tempered glass, these monocrystalline solar panels are lightweight, weatherproof, and come with a handy kickstand so that you can place them at the ideal angle.

description: 猜拳太费时，扔鞋太老土，这款1美分大小两面分别镌刻着“f**k yes”和“f**k no”的决策者硬币，让你把所有左右为难的抉择都交给命运，正所谓老天自有安排老天爱笨小孩
content: If you’re the type who has a tough time making decisions, these decision maker coins will be a heaven sent. Each side of the coin comes with an image of a hand flipping the bird along with an enthusiastic “f**k yes” and “f**k no”.

description: 从1982年在拉斯维加斯消费电子展上首次问世之后，被誉为晶体管领域“福特T型车”的康懋达64迄今依然保持着最畅销电脑型号的世界纪录，这款迷你怀旧复刻版绝对是历史级珍藏
content: Nostalgia – so hot right now. Get in on all the fun by adding the Mini Commodore 64 to your entertainment center. Roughly half the size of the original, it features a classic retro design paired with updated features like an HDMI output and 64 built-in classic games.

Cars and Curves is the coffee table book that no gear-head or car aficionado will be able to put down. This tribute book to Porsche’s long history comes loaded with amazing pictures of classic models like the Carrera GT and 906 along with informative factoids about the cars.

description: 这款用抗紫外线涂料印在乙烯基粘合剂上的米黄色伪装电插头贴纸，完全以假乱真并有效防止褪色，愚人节时请尽情欣赏你的朋友抓狂地试图将笔记本电源插入的场景吧
content: Have a laugh at the expense of others as you watch them struggle to plug in their electronic devices into the fake outlet sticker. Each one is printed onto a durable 4 mil vinyl adhesive with UV resistant paint to ensure the graphics don’t fade with time or exposure to sunlight.
